column4: can someone help me with my webcam and skype.. It wont work for skype, but it works on cheese.
you dont get any video in skype? can you select the camera in skype?
there is only one option in skype.. And no- no video.
you could try using LD_PRELOAD to force skype to use v4l2 library it might work
if you are 32bit install it would be /usr/lib instead of /usr/lib32
im honestly not sure what the V4L control flags do. try it without, then try it with
where do i put the script
ok- what do i name it?
i called my skype-fixed.sh if you just call it skype double check that $HOME/bin comes first in your $PATH
and don't forget to chmod +x the file
its possible your firefox profile is confused. you might try rm -rf .firefox/plugins or some such
you do have the browser closed while you do this right?
